sentences.en: Any writing may become a negotiable check.
sentences.cn: 任何书写都会成为可流通的支票.

sentences.en: Beneficiary's draft is negotiable at sight by the negotiating bank.
sentences.cn: 受益人汇票可通过议付行即期议付.

sentences.en: He says his claim is not negotiable.
sentences.cn: 他说他的要求是不容讨价还价的.

sentences.en: If sea is connected negotiable securities, letter negotiable securities.
sentences.cn: 如海通证券 、 中信证券等.

sentences.en: Negotiations began but failed, because the students presented " non - negotiable demands. "
sentences.cn: 谈判开始,却又告破裂, 因为学生方面提出了 “ 无可协商的要求 ”.

sentences.en: No pickup allowed. Shipping & Handling fees and method are non - negotiable.
sentences.cn: 运输方式 和 手续费用及保险是不容商量的,请谅解.

sentences.en: Part-time barman required. Hours and salary negotiable.
sentences.cn: 招聘兼职酒吧男服务员，工作时间及薪金面议。

sentences.en: Parts of the road had been washed away by streams, but it was negotiable.
sentences.cn: 部分路面已被河水冲毁，但仍可以通行。

sentences.en: Personally designate each player a non negotiable card that they cannot change.
sentences.cn: 亲自选定各个球员他们无法改变的一张非可协议的卡片.

sentences.en: Re our quotation tax md 8695 dated Oct 11,82 price negotiable.
sentences.cn: 关于我方82年10月11日报价电传.MD8695,价格可以协商.

sentences.en: Stock is convertible into cash or other negotiable securities.
sentences.cn: 股票可换成现金或其他有价证券.

sentences.en: The Manor is for sale at a negotiable price.
sentences.cn: 该庄园现在出售，价格可议。

sentences.en: The road is only negotiable in the dry season.
sentences.cn: 这条道只有在旱季才能通行.

sentences.en: The terms of employment are negotiable.
This is an exciting challenge and salary is negotiable with bonus share.
sentences.cn: 这是一份充满挑战又有趣的的工作,薪金、奖金、花红可面议.

sentences.en: You ll haggle over something that is not negotiable.
sentences.cn: 你会为一些不可质疑的事情辩论.

trans.tran_cn: 可谈判的，可协商的，可商量的，（票据）可兑现的
trans.tran_en: an offer, price, contract etc that is negotiable can be discussed and changed before being agreed on
